title: Arthur Penn: the director during the filming of "Little Big Man"
creator_credit: Elliott Erwitt and Elliott Erwitt Enterprises
brief_description: A portrait of the director Arthur Penn at work on the film ‘Little Big Man’. Using extracts from the film and footage shot behind-the-scene this film illustrates the two main problems involved in the production of a film, the relationship between director and star and the insertion of the director’s personal convictions into his film.
